briefTitle: Quality of Life After Conservative Oncoplastic Surgery in Breast Cancer Patients (IRONY: lIfe afteR ONcoplastic surgerY)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Clinical diagnosis of breast cancer
* Must be able for conservative oncoplastic surgery with type 1 and 2 procedures who give informed consent to the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who are pregnant or breastfeeding
* Patients in emergency situations
* Subjects unable to understand and want
